author: Paradoxymoron
title: Not the best...
review: This was a game I got earlier this year hoping it would be amazing. It wasn't. There were many innacurate details, none of the characters can jump, ONLY ONE of them can WALK THROUGH WATER, if you die as a certain character you lose him/her until you find another of his/her mask i bored with it quickly and hated the music. I disliked it soooooo much that i am actually thinking of selling it on Ebay. Don't buy this. it has some (with great emphasis on SOME)cool features but its not that great for $30. And if your a Hard-core Bionicle fan then you would probably, like me, be dissapointed by the games innacuracy. Again Don't Get It!
